featured.text: Many great forms of exercise—like walking, swimming, or gentle stretching—get results without the 38 or discomfort some people associate with exercise.

definition.zh_def: 伸展，拉伸或擴展身體的動作或過程。
definition.en_def: The act of extending or enlarging something, especially the body or a muscle.
definition.example: She enjoys stretching every morning to improve her flexibility.
